articles.title: Travel
articles.contents:
Do u want a days of from ur kids or siblings if they are annoying. Well here at Horizon Travels u can have the relaxation of ur time and u can book as many days as u want. U can get discounts. So come and book a place for ur vacation. so call us on 00805 9967 332
or email us on Horizon.Travels@gmail.com.

articles.title: Discounts
articles.contents: This is where u can travel for prices that are shocking.If u are a new customer u will get a 70% discount and if u are a regular customer u will get a 50% discount. Better than the other discounts that u get.
